entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:50 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 12:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:57 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:57 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:57 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
